modName: Better Nightingale Blade and Bow Enchantment
summary: Lowered the Cost of the Nightingale Bow and Sword Enchantment Use.
descriptionHtml:
I thought that the enchantments for the Nightingale Sword and Bow didnt last all that long before having to recharge them...

All I did is reduce the drain per hit (sword) or arrow shot (bow).

Does not require any DLC, however it does use Skyrim.esm and Update.esm. If running other Nightingale mods, place this at the bottom of your load order after them.

It's a 1:1 ratio, meaning that you will have 500 hits with the sword and 500 shots with the bow before having to recharge them. All version of the sword and Bow are the same, so it wont matter when you get/got them.

Better NG Blade and Bow Enchantment.esp is the plugin name.

Users of Bluarchon's Wrath of Nature Mod Please see my sticky post for more information.

For those wondering...as you get higher levels of the blade and Bow (either through the quest progression or Upgrading it through Smithing *I think*) the enchantment will range from 500 to 3000, but still with a cost of 1, meaning that even at the 2nd stage you will have 1000 hits before needing to recharge + the increase to the stats normally
